name: Lhasa Mountain
overview: The Yeti Monster. For a thousand years, his evil legend has haunted the icy slopes of Lhasa Mountain. No climber has ever reached the top. No climber has ever returned. Determined, you ascend alone, step by step. Watch out! That sheer edge could hurtle you to your death! Above you - a gigantic boulder ready to fall! What's that? The ugly growl of the Yeti creature! Is he above you or below you? Can you make it to the top before time runs out and YOU join the list of those who never returned from Lhasa Mountain?
